items.content_html: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.
items.title: sadaigm/ai-as-agent: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.

items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension for managing AI prompts efficiently. Save, organize, and quickly use your prompts across different AI platforms like ChatGPT and Claude.

items.content_html: `sqlparser-devexpress` is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts SQL `WHERE` clauses into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) and transforms them into a DevExpress-compatible filter format. It supports dynamic parameter extraction, short-circuit optimization, and efficient state-based filtering.
items.title: RohitM-IN/SQLParser:  `sqlparser-devexpress` is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts SQL `WHERE` clauses into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) and transforms them into a DevExpress-compatible filter format. It supports dynamic parameter extraction, short-circuit optimization, and efficient state-based filtering.

items.title: its-ryyt/Philippines---Javascript-Address-Selector: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript address selector for the Philippines, designed to streamline the process of selecting regions, provinces, cities, and barangays in web applications.

items.content_html: Tryflow is a lightweight, production-ready utility for handling try-catch-finally blocks in JavaScript/TypeScript. It helps reduce boilerplate, improve error handling, and provide advanced features such as automatic retries, logging, customizable fallback mechanisms and more...
items.title: Kei-K23/tryflow: Tryflow is a lightweight, production-ready utility for handling try-catch-finally blocks in JavaScript/TypeScript. It helps reduce boilerplate, improve error handling, and provide advanced features such as automatic retries, logging, customizable fallback mechanisms and more...

items.content_html: A lightweight and modular TypeScript HTTP Server with support for routing, middleware, static file serving, and query handling. This server is built using Node.js and the native http module, ensuring efficiency and scalability.

items.content_html: JSWhere is a lightweight JavaScript library for detecting runtime environments like React Native, Expo, Vite, Next.js, and NestJS. With zero dependencies and type-safe implementation, it provides accurate environment detection for both frontend and backend applications, helping developers write environment-specific code with confidence.
items.title: BiteCraft/JSWhere: JSWhere is a lightweight JavaScript library for detecting runtime environments like React Native, Expo, Vite, Next.js, and NestJS. With zero dependencies and type-safe implementation, it provides accurate environment detection for both frontend and backend applications, helping developers write environment-specific code with confidence.

items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

items.content_html: A lightweight and developer-friendly OAuth 2.0 client library for secure authentication and seamless token management. OAuthx simplifies the integration of OAuth 2.0 authentication flows, including authorization code, PKCE and refresh token handling.
